name: Feed the Beast (spookey's)
description:
✦ Feed the Beast ✦

Music by Lena Raine (Celeste)

 ⍰ How to Play 

   A beast will visit your village every minute If you don't leave it a pile of gold, it will    destroy your village! Open the seed menu at the top left, and click to select a seed,    then click on open farmland to plant. Plants outline in green when they're finished,    click on them to harvest. Click on the monument in the top middle to place the gold,    you must do this every round and the amount will increase forever! Make sure you    always save gold to plant seeds, because you can get stuck! Houses automatically   speed up random crops Windmills increase your gold earned by 5%
